resources.string: Touch this button to bring up a color chooser for the background color of the widget.
Touch this button to bring up a color chooser for the text color of the widget.
Touch anywhere in this pane to select the text color of the widget.
Touch anywhere in this pane to select the background color of the widget.
Move the thumb on this slider to adjust the amount of red in the color.
Move the thumb on this slider to adjust the amount of green in the color.
Move the thumb on this slider to adjust the amount of blue in the color.
